description: Faced with protests and attacks on statues, the Dutch are struggling with a legacy of racism.
title: Wounds of Dutch history expose deep racial divide
title_page: Wounds of Dutch history expose deep racial divide - BBC News
maintext: "People being raised now find it difficult to imagine what it was like," she told me. "Going back to history is essential to understand how much of that has influenced our contemporary culture and ways of seeing or not seeing."
